ack.p: This research was supported by Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft Funding (SFB 806, TP B2) (to M.S.). V.D. acknowledges support by the European Social Fund, Sectoral Operational Programme Human Resources Development, Contract POSDRU 6/1.5/S/3—“Doctoral Studies: Through Science Towards Society,” PCE-2016-0179 Grant CARPATHEMS, and IFA-CEA C4-08 (FREem). Part of the isotopic analysis were funded by the University of South Florida via an internal grant (to B.P.O.).
